text: Randy Travis (born May 4, 1959 in Marshville, North Carolina) is an American country music singer and actor. 1978 was the first time he had a song on Billboard's Hot Country Songs music chart. As late as 2014 he had an album on Billboard's Top Country Albums music chart. He first went into mainstream in the mid to late 1980s, having a number of hits. He acted in several movies, including The Rainmaker (1997). ==Discography== ===Singles=== * "I Told You So" (1988) * "Three Wooden Crosses" (2002) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Country musicians from North Carolina Category:Singers from North Carolina Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from North Carolina Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Warner Bros. Records artists
title: Randy Travis
